channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bears About to Get Flushed Out?
item.description: Hey, Ross here! This week’s AAII sentiment survey shows individual investors are at their most bearish since November 2023—right before the market sur...
